thread.title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year

title: Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year
text: > Entertainment Chris Rock to host ABC's Oscar broadcast next year FILE - In this Feb. 28, 2015 file photo, comedian Chris Rock performs at Comedy Central's "Night of Too Many Stars: America Comes Together for Autism Programs" in New York. Rock will return to host the Oscars for a second time. The showâ€™s producers say the prolific comedian-filmmaker will be at the helm for the 88th Academy Awards next February 28. He first hosted the awards ceremony in 2005. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File)
